entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 6:13 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:13 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:13 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
